newArcToken

public ArcToken newArcToken(Process process,
                            Arc arc,
                            NodeToken parent)
Description copied from interface: Engine
Generates a new ArcToken for the given Process, pointing to the given Arc.

Parameters:
process - The Process which the new ArcToken will belong to
arc - The Arc the new ArcToken is being placed on
parent - The NodeToken which preceded this ArcToken.
Returns:
A new ArcToken

newNodeToken

public NodeToken newNodeToken(Process process,
                              Node node,
                              List<ArcToken> parents)
Description copied from interface: Engine
Generates a new NodeToken for the given Process, pointing to the given Node.

Parameters:
process - The Process which the new NodeToken will belong to
node - The Node the new NodeToken is being placed on
parents - The list of ArcTokens which preceded this NodeToken
Returns:
A new NodeToken

newProcess

public Process newProcess(Graph graph)
Description copied from interface: Engine
Generates a new Process for the given Graph. Execution of the process is not started by this method. The method will be used by Engine.startWorkflow(Graph), and should not need to be called otherwise.

Parameters:
graph - The Graph the Process will be executing.
Returns:
A new Process
